Friendsgiving: 15 Best Easy Recipes for Cozy Evening

November 15, 2024

Friendsgiving is a festive and relaxed spin on Thanksgiving that lets you celebrate with friends over a creative, personalized meal. On Recipes No Limits, you can build your Friendsgiving recipes from the ingredients you already have, making the occasion truly unique and fun. With easy Friendsgiving meals, savoury Thanksgiving side dishes, and holiday potluck ideas, this gathering becomes a chance to share, experiment, and enjoy. Whether serving classic dishes like roasted turkey or exploring vegetarian Thanksgiving options, Friendsgiving is about crafting a menu that brings everyone together.

From cheesy casseroles and fall-inspired salads to decadent Thanksgiving desserts, the table can blend traditional and new recipes. Each guest can bring their favourite dish, adding to the excitement and variety of the feast. Friendsgiving’s potluck style makes it easy to try dishes from different culinary backgrounds and dietary choices—perfect for the spirit of community that defines the holiday.

For those who enjoy hosting, creating a well-rounded Friendsgiving spread can include more than just main courses and sides. Try experimenting with signature Thanksgiving drinks, like festive cocktails or seasonal non-alcoholic options, to elevate the celebration. And for dessert, the options are endless, from pies and pecan bars to inventive pastries that embrace fall flavours. With Recipes No Limits, every Friendsgiving dish can be customized and crafted to fit your gathering, making this holiday meal one that’s both delicious and memorable.

So, if you're looking for a way to embrace both comfort and creativity, gather your friends and enjoy the chance to share your favourite Friendsgiving recipes. Whether it’s your first Friendsgiving or a beloved tradition, this gathering celebrates the joy of food, friendship, and flavours that everyone can enjoy together.

#

Loaded Green Bean Casserole

45 min
$15
280 kcal
Difficulty: 20%
Servings: 8

Allergens:

DairyOnion

Dietary Tags:

Vegetarian

Cuisine:

American

Course:

Side Dish

Tags:

Comfort FoodCasseroleEasyVegetarian

Description

Loaded Green Bean Casserole is a delicious twist on the classic dish, featuring tender green beans, crispy onions, and a creamy, flavorful sauce. Perfect for Thanksgiving or any holiday meal, this easy casserole is a crowd-pleaser. With its rich taste and comforting texture, it's a must-try recipe for your Friendsgiving or family gathering. Enjoy a festive side that everyone will love, offering both comfort and a touch of gourmet flair.

Ingredients

  • green beans (fresh or frozen): 4 cups
  • cream of mushroom soup: 2 cans (10.5 oz each)
  • sour cream: 1 cup
  • shredded cheddar cheese: 2 cups
  • french fried onions: 1 cup
  • garlic powder: 1 teaspoon
  • salt: 1/2 teaspoon
  • black pepper: 1/4 teaspoon

Date Created:

11/15/2024

Roasted Turkey with Herb Butter

210 min
$45
3500 kcal
Difficulty: 40%
Servings: 10

Allergens:

Dairy

Dietary Tags:

Gluten-FreeDairy-FreePaleo

Cuisine:

AmericanTraditional

Course:

Main CourseHoliday Meal

Tags:

Main CourseThanksgivingHoliday Meal

Description

This Roasted Turkey with Herb Butter is a succulent centerpiece for your Friendsgiving feast. Infused with a flavorful herb butter, the turkey comes out golden, crispy on the outside, and tender inside. It’s the perfect main dish for your holiday gathering, offering a savory, juicy alternative to other festive meals. Whether it's for Thanksgiving or a Friendsgiving celebration, this easy recipe will impress your guests and elevate your spread. Enjoy a flavorful, hassle-free turkey that pairs beautifully with all your holiday sides.

Ingredients

  • whole turkey: 12-14 lbs
  • unsalted butter: 1 cup
  • fresh rosemary: 2 tablespoons
  • fresh thyme: 2 tablespoons
  • fresh sage: 2 tablespoons
  • garlic: 4 cloves
  • salt: 2 tablespoons
  • black pepper: 1 tablespoon
  • lemon: 1
  • onion: 1 large
  • carrots: 2
  • celery: 2

Date Created:

11/15/2024

Roasted Brussels Sprouts with Olive Oil and Garlic

35 min
$5
120 kcal
Difficulty: 20%
Servings: 4

Dietary Tags:

VeganVegetarianGluten-Free

Cuisine:

American

Course:

Side Dish

Tags:

Side DishHealthyEasy

Description

Roasted Brussels Sprouts with Olive Oil and Garlic is a simple yet flavorful side dish for your Friendsgiving celebration. These crispy, caramelized sprouts are tossed in garlic-infused olive oil for a savory bite that pairs perfectly with your Thanksgiving mains. Ideal for guests seeking a healthy, delicious alternative, this easy recipe adds a touch of elegance to any holiday meal. A must-try for your Friendsgiving or Thanksgiving spread, it’s a great addition to your collection of quick and tasty holiday side dishes.

Ingredients

  • brussels sprouts: 1 lb
  • olive oil: 2 tbsp
  • garlic (minced): 3 cloves
  • salt: 1 tsp
  • black pepper: 1/2 tsp

Apple Crumble Pie

60 min
$10
300 kcal
Difficulty: 30%
Servings: 8

Allergens:

glutendairy

Dietary Tags:

vegetarian

Cuisine:

American

Course:

Dessert

Tags:

desserteasycomfort food

Description

Apple Crumble Pie is the perfect dessert to add a sweet touch to your Friendsgiving celebration. With its warm, spiced apple filling and a buttery, crispy crumble topping, this pie is a crowd-pleaser. A delightful alternative to traditional pies, it’s a must-have for your Thanksgiving or Friendsgiving dessert table. Easy to make and full of comforting flavors, this dessert is sure to become a holiday favorite that complements your savory sides and festive drinks. Enjoy this classic, indulgent treat with friends and family.

Ingredients

  • apples: 6 cups, peeled and sliced
  • sugar: 1/2 cup
  • cinnamon: 1 tsp
  • lemon juice: 1 tbsp
  • all-purpose flour: 1 cup
  • rolled oats: 1/2 cup
  • brown sugar: 1/2 cup
  • butter: 1/2 cup, melted
  • pie crust: 1, store-bought

Date Created:

11/15/2024

Spinach Artichoke Dip

30 min
$10
200 kcal
Difficulty: 30%
Servings: 6

Allergens:

Dairy

Dietary Tags:

Vegetarian

Cuisine:

American

Course:

Appetizer

Tags:

AppetizerDipParty Food

Description

Spinach Artichoke Dip is a creamy, cheesy appetizer that's perfect for Friendsgiving or Thanksgiving gatherings. Packed with spinach, artichokes, and a savory blend of cheeses, this dip is a crowd favorite. It’s easy to prepare and can be served warm with crackers, bread, or veggies. Whether you're hosting a casual Friendsgiving potluck or looking for a party appetizer, this dip is sure to be a hit. Its rich flavor and comforting texture make it an ideal choice for your holiday spread.

Ingredients

  • frozen spinach, thawed and drained: 1 cup
  • artichoke hearts, canned, drained and chopped: 1 cup
  • cream cheese, softened: 8 oz
  • sour cream: 1/2 cup
  • mayonnaise: 1/4 cup
  • parmesan cheese, grated: 1/2 cup
  • mozzarella cheese, shredded: 1/2 cup
  • garlic powder: 1 tsp
  • salt: to taste
  • black pepper: to taste

Date Created:

11/15/2024

Honey Glazed Carrots

30 min
$3.5
120 kcal
Difficulty: 20%
Servings: 4

Dietary Tags:

VegetarianGluten-Free

Cuisine:

American

Course:

Side Dish

Tags:

EasySide DishHealthy

Description

Honey Glazed Carrots are a sweet and savory side dish perfect for Friendsgiving or Thanksgiving. The natural sweetness of carrots is enhanced by a rich honey glaze, making this simple recipe a crowd favorite. With a tender texture and glossy finish, these carrots complement holiday mains and add a burst of color to your festive spread. Whether you’re hosting or attending a Friendsgiving potluck, this dish is an easy, flavorful addition to your holiday menu.

Ingredients

  • carrots: 1 lb (about 4-5 medium carrots)
  • honey: 2 tablespoons
  • butter: 1 tablespoon
  • salt: 1/2 teaspoon
  • pepper: 1/4 teaspoon
  • water: 1/4 cup

Pumpkin Pasta Alla Vodka

30 min
$12.5
450 kcal
Difficulty: 30%
Servings: 4

Allergens:

DairyGluten

Dietary Tags:

Vegetarian

Cuisine:

Italian

Course:

Main Course

Tags:

EasyPastaComfort Food

Description

Pumpkin Pasta Alla Vodka is a creamy, rich dish that blends the fall flavors of pumpkin with the smoothness of vodka sauce. Perfect for a Friendsgiving or Thanksgiving dinner, this unique twist on traditional pasta offers a savory, seasonal option for your holiday table. The silky sauce pairs beautifully with the pasta, creating a comforting and indulgent meal. Serve this dish for a crowd-pleasing vegetarian option that’s ideal for your festive gathering.

Ingredients

  • pasta (penne or fusilli): 8 oz
  • pumpkin puree: 1 cup
  • vodka: 1/2 cup
  • heavy cream: 1/2 cup
  • parmesan cheese (grated): 1/2 cup
  • garlic (minced): 2 cloves
  • olive oil: 2 tablespoons
  • salt: to taste
  • black pepper: to taste
  • red pepper flakes: optional, to taste

Honeycrisp Apple Cider

$5
150 kcal
Difficulty: 10%
Servings: 4

Dietary Tags:

VegetarianGluten-Free

Cuisine:

American

Course:

Beverage

Tags:

BeverageFallEasySweet

Description

Honeycrisp Apple Cider is a refreshing and sweet drink that perfectly captures the essence of fall. Ideal for your Friendsgiving or Thanksgiving celebration, this cozy beverage combines the crispness of Honeycrisp apples with a blend of spices for a warm, inviting drink. Whether served hot or chilled, it’s a crowd-pleasing option that pairs wonderfully with both savory and sweet dishes. Add this to your holiday menu for a seasonal drink that everyone will love, offering a comforting and festive touch to your gathering.

Ingredients

  • honeycrisp apples: 6-8
  • water: 4 cups
  • brown sugar: 1/2 cup
  • cinnamon sticks: 2
  • whole cloves: 5
  • nutmeg (optional): 1/4 teaspoon

Sausage and Herb Stuffing

45 min
$10
300 kcal
Difficulty: 20%
Servings: 8

Allergens:

Gluten

Dietary Tags:

Contains MeatDairy-Free Option

Cuisine:

American

Course:

Side Dish

Tags:

Side DishComfort FoodThanksgiving

Description

Sausage and Herb Stuffing is a savory and flavorful side dish perfect for your Friendsgiving or Thanksgiving celebration. Combining hearty sausage, aromatic herbs, and a golden, crispy texture, this stuffing is a comforting classic that complements turkey and other holiday mains. Whether baked in a casserole or stuffed into the bird, it’s a must-have addition to your festive spread. This easy recipe brings the warmth of the season to your table, making it an essential part of your holiday meal.

Ingredients

  • italian sausage: 1 pound
  • day-old bread cubes: 6 cups
  • onion, chopped: 1
  • celery, chopped: 2 stalks
  • chicken broth: 2 cups
  • fresh parsley, chopped: 1/4 cup
  • fresh sage, chopped: 1 tablespoon
  • fresh thyme, chopped: 1 tablespoon
  • salt: 1 teaspoon
  • pepper: 1/2 teaspoon
  • butter: 4 tablespoons

Allergens:

Dietary Tags:

Cuisine:

Course:

Tags:

Description

Cheesy Mashed Potato Casserole is a creamy, indulgent side dish that’s perfect for your Friendsgiving or Thanksgiving feast. Loaded with cheese and buttery mashed potatoes, this comforting casserole is a crowd favorite. Topped with a crispy golden crust, it’s a delicious way to elevate your holiday meal. Whether served alongside turkey, ham, or roasted vegetables, this easy and cheesy dish will add a savory richness to your festive spread, making it a must-try recipe for any holiday gathering.

Ingredients

  • mashed potatoes: 4 cups
  • cream cheese: 8 oz
  • sour cream: 1 cup
  • shredded cheddar cheese: 2 cups
  • green onions: 1/4 cup
  • garlic powder: 1 tsp
  • salt: 1 tsp
  • black pepper: 1/2 tsp
  • butter: 2 tbsp

Blue Cheese and Pear Flatbread

25 min
$8.5
350 kcal
Difficulty: 20%
Servings: 2

Allergens:

DairyNuts

Dietary Tags:

Vegetarian

Cuisine:

AmericanMediterranean

Course:

AppetizerSnack

Tags:

EasyQuickSavoryAppetizer

Description

Blue Cheese and Pear Flatbread is a unique and flavorful appetizer perfect for your Friendsgiving or Thanksgiving gathering. The combination of tangy blue cheese and sweet pears creates a delicious contrast, while the crispy flatbread provides a perfect base. This easy-to-make recipe offers a gourmet touch to your holiday spread, making it ideal for guests seeking something different. Serve it as a starter or side dish to impress your friends and family with its sophisticated yet simple flavors. Perfect for any festive occasion.

Ingredients

  • flatbread: 1 large
  • blue cheese: 4 oz
  • pear: 1 medium, thinly sliced
  • olive oil: 1 tbsp
  • honey: 1 tbsp
  • walnuts: 1/4 cup, chopped (optional)
  • fresh arugula: 1 cup (optional)
  • salt: to taste
  • pepper: to taste

Servings: 12

Allergens:

Dietary Tags:

Cuisine:

Course:

Tags:

AppetizerSnackEasy

Description

Cranberry Brie Bites are a delicious, bite-sized appetizer that combines creamy Brie and sweet cranberry sauce, perfect for adding a touch of sophistication to your Friendsgiving or Thanksgiving gathering. These flaky pastry cups are easy to prepare and offer a delightful mix of savory and sweet, making them a great addition to your holiday menu. Whether served as a starter or a party snack, these elegant morsels are sure to impress your guests with their flavor and festive appeal.

Ingredients

  • puff pastry sheets: 1 (store-bought)
  • brie cheese: 8 oz.
  • cranberry sauce: 1/2 cup
  • egg (for egg wash): 1
  • fresh thyme (optional, for garnish): 1 sprig

Description

Pull-Apart Pesto Turkey Sliders are a delicious and easy-to-serve appetizer for your Friendsgiving or holiday gathering. These savory sliders are filled with tender turkey and aromatic pesto, all nestled between soft, fluffy rolls. Perfect for a festive meal, they offer a fun and flavorful way to serve up turkey in a new way. Ideal for potlucks or casual get-togethers, these sliders are a great addition to your holiday menu, providing a tasty balance of herby, savory, and savory flavors in each bite.

Ingredients

  • turkey slider patties: 1 lb
  • pesto sauce: 1/2 cup
  • slider buns: 8
  • mozzarella cheese (sliced): 8 slices
  • olive oil: 1 tbsp
  • salt: to taste
  • pepper: to taste

Cheesy Beef Nachos

25 min
$10
600 kcal
Difficulty: 20%
Servings: 4

Allergens:

DairyGluten

Dietary Tags:

High ProteinComfort Food

Cuisine:

AmericanMexican

Course:

AppetizerSnack

Tags:

QuickEasySnackParty Food

Description

Cheesy Beef Nachos are the ultimate comfort food for your Friendsgiving or holiday party. Piled high with seasoned beef, melted cheese, and topped with fresh ingredients, these nachos are perfect for sharing. Easy to make and full of bold flavors, they’re an ideal dish for casual gatherings or potlucks. Serve them as an appetizer or a fun main course, and enjoy this crowd-pleasing favorite at your next festive event. Whether you're hosting or bringing a dish, these nachos are sure to be a hit!

Ingredients

  • tortilla chips: 1 bag
  • ground beef: 1 pound
  • cheddar cheese: 2 cups shredded
  • taco seasoning: 1 packet
  • sour cream: 1 cup
  • sliced jalapeños: 1/2 cup
  • chopped green onions: 1/4 cup
  • diced tomatoes: 1 cup

#

Simple Apple Cranberry Sauce

25 min
$3.5
100 kcal
Difficulty: 10%
Servings: 8

Dietary Tags:

VegetarianVegan

Cuisine:

American

Course:

Side DishCondiment

Tags:

SauceSidesHoliday

Description

Simple Apple Cranberry Sauce is a fresh and tangy twist on a classic holiday side. Perfect for Friendsgiving or Thanksgiving, this easy recipe combines the sweetness of apples with the tartness of cranberries, creating a deliciously balanced sauce. It’s a simple, homemade accompaniment that pairs wonderfully with turkey, stuffing, or any holiday spread. With its vibrant flavors and easy preparation, this sauce is a great way to elevate your festive meal and add a burst of seasonal flavor to your gathering.

Ingredients

  • fresh cranberries: 2 cups
  • apple (peeled, cored, and chopped): 1 large
  • sugar: 1 cup
  • water: 1 cup
  • cinnamon (optional): 1/2 teaspoon

Date Created:

11/15/2024

Friendsgiving is a wonderful opportunity to gather with friends and enjoy delicious, comforting dishes. From savoury appetizers to sweet treats, these recipes offer something for everyone to enjoy. Whether you’re hosting or contributing to the meal, these dishes will make your gathering memorable. Celebrate the season with flavorful, easy-to-make recipes that add warmth and joy to your festive spread. Don’t forget to get creative and make your Friendsgiving meal your own!

Recipes No Limits is a platform that empowers users to create personalized dishes using the ingredients they have on hand. It allows you to explore a wide variety of meal options based on what’s available in your kitchen, making it easier to cook with what you already have. Whether you're looking to try something new or simply need inspiration, this website provides endless possibilities for home cooks, offering both simple and more advanced recipes tailored to your pantry's contents.
